story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I guess the next opportunity for us to battle
is the semifinals, huh!
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! Let’s make sure we both win! I’ll see
you there!
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: No matter who wins, no hard feelings, OK?
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Of course! It’s a showdown between the
prettiest girls in Johto and Kanto!
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: Excuse me. I hate to burst your bubble...
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: ...But you’ll have to get through US first!
story_arceus_08_07000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Don’t take us lightly, now. You’ll be in for a
world of pain if you do!
